website_summaries.verdict: Easiest way to see and use your phone during exercise.
pros: Straps onto wrist instead of upper arm
Locking mechanism ensures phone doesn't rotate during movement
Earns bonus marks from those who want to easily take photos or videos while running
Adjusts to a variety of wrist sizes
cons: No storage space for keys or cards

customer_reviews.title: ...Why weren't smartphone workout phone holders designed like this in the first place?! :o
customer_reviews.text: ...simply put, this product is amazing. Bands have not broken (yet, hopefully never will)...it's kind of a pain dealing with the buttons on the front face of a Samsung Galaxy phone with it, but the Matone does everything it says it will do. Swivel on the pivot and take a picture?? No problemo. Tap buttons far more easily than through a nasty plastic cover that gets sweat and grime and dust inside it? You betcha. And seriously, SOOOOO much more convenient on your WRIST than on your BICEP. Not as easy to tap buttons and manipulate your phone there!!
customer_reviews.author: R Kent Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!  Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for working out. Not so much for music but for my workout routine information. Part of the bottom and top of the screen are blocked by the rubber restraints but that is not an issue. I knew that going in. I have a Samsung Galaxy Note9, in a case, and it works great even with the case on. I have an average size forearm and it fits comfortably on it. If my forearm was much bigger, it may get a bit tight, even with the elastic. Still...I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: John A Waclawski

customer_reviews.title: Great companion on my hikes.
customer_reviews.text: This wristband works great for my hikes when I want to keep track of my route with GPS. I can view either landscape or portrait view. It keeps me from having to dig into my pocket every time I want to check miles, altitude or direction. I would have given it 5 stars if the pivot was off-center just a bit. Being centered made it a little troublesome when using the camera feature on my phone because my arm covered the lower portion of the picture. Not a major problem, solvable with cropping, but a minor inconvenience non-the-less. Some of my hiking companions were impressed with it and wanted one for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: R. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Iphone wristband
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly and was interestingly something I could wear. My iPhone was secure and was easy to put the iPhone in and out of the wristband. I purchased this, at age 76.5 because I am outdoor a lot in the summer, gardening, etc., and one does not carry a purse at these times. My husband, who is 6'3", said put it in your pocket. Well, at 5'3", I am not able to bend with it anywhere near my waist. The only slight may be that it is heavy on my arm. I just have to get used to it because it does work and is secure.
customer_reviews.author: Family Researcher

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but wristband is too small
customer_reviews.text: this is great for holding my phone on my wrist. I feel a little silly doing it, but I need to do it for work to keep both my hands free. It's really great. Fits my iphone xs that's already in a case just fine. Seems quality enough to last for a while. The only problem is that the wrist strap is too small. If I have even a sweater on, it's uncomfortable. They should make the strap at least 2 or 3 inches longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for running
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy. I was unsure when I purchased it, thought it would be flimsy, but it wasn't. The only issue that I have with it is that the band that wraps around the arm is rather small. I think it's for people with really skinny arms, my it fits pretty snug for my husband, and just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Honest review-works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a note 5 with a bulky OtterBox case and that fits perfect... that's bear max, though. I love it so far, haven't taken it off my decice since I got it. I mean...it's no Pip-Boy but, it'll do nicely.
customer_reviews.author: E. Slater

customer_reviews.title: Very secure; band is a bit tight.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the holder feels secure, like it'll never drop my phone ever. I do a ton of calisthenics and cardio, this worked perfectly. I also liked how I can rotate it with perfect ease. My only complaint is that the bands to secure my phone is a bit tight (I have an iPhone 6). Almost to the point that I'm worried that I might rip the bands, it's a very minor issue. Other than that, It hasn't given me any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Armstraps do not work for me as I like to skip through music, check emails regularly, and answer my phone. You can't do that when your phone is strapped to your arm. This wrist strap is perfect, and it rotates vertical or horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: Myprsnlrevu

customer_reviews.title: Works with a thicker wallet phone case too!
customer_reviews.text: I am a "Sample Lady" and I am required to bring my own device for multiple reasons. I tend to forget where I put my phone ALOT!! Now I don't lose it, and it saves me having panic attacks over losing my debit/credit cards, etc!
customer_reviews.author: Nise

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described, no issues with it so far. Fits my Galaxy S7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I have an iphone XS which doesn’t have a home button so the swipe function is hard to use, but other than that i like it
customer_reviews.author: cyz mtrz

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Companion
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep my iPhone 7 strapped to the inside of my wrist. That way I can instantly check my heartrate and other stats while running. It works perfectly fine. When I go cycling, I also use it to strap my phone to the handlebars. This makes it much safer to check these stats without having to stop, take my eyes off the path, or go digging in my pockets.
customer_reviews.author: A. Krause

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me!
customer_reviews.text: ❤️❤️❤️ My wristband! It works great for my lifestyle! I like to use it at work, while exercising, and it is a much needed accessory on the days I wear an outfit without pockets! Many people have stopped me to ask where I got this wristband from because they need one for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: MMWW

customer_reviews.title: I'm too active....it was more in the way.
customer_reviews.text: I really thought having my phone on my wrist instead of my upper arm would be better, because I could answer calls or switch songs easier, but for me.... apparently i'm too active! It kept getting in the way.... and I kept hitting it on things. And my wrist would get so sweaty. I so wanted this to work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I thought it wasn’t going to work because it’s really tight but once I used some female muscle I got it to work. I don’t know if it will work great for running yet but it seems secure. I’m going to use it for zip lining and recording.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: I find that using a binder clip to attach my phone to my pants isn't a great way to go
customer_reviews.text: Walking/running in the spring/summer has been a challenge...During the cooler months I have a vest or jacket with pockets to put my cell phone in (I listen to music with my phone). I find that using a binder clip to attach my phone to my pants isn't a great way to go, (I have to unclip the phone to change channels or answer a call) and a fanny pack doesn't allow for easy access either. This is a great device. It stays in place even when running, and the 180 degree turn function is awesome. I'd definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different but doable
customer_reviews.text: Most likely works well with iPhone 7and lower, but because the iPhone X has Face ID, the support straps partial block the sensors to unlock the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Saunte Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. I have the 7s. I am cautious sometimes scared it might fall off my arm, but so far it hasn’t. Feels good on my arm, not to heavy. But a little bulky. I love having my phone right at my fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trying out in various situations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to have my smartphone with me constantly and to have it vibrate on my wrist rather than in a pocket. I found that it doesn't transmit vibrations to my wrist well and is clunky to wear at work, so have put it away.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use it for hiking not working out. I don’t really care for the feel on my skin but it does the job and not afraid it will fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Yamaira M.

customer_reviews.title: Way too small for what it claims to hold
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning this. The box claims to fit a iPhone 8. My case is very snug against my phone and adds less than the width of a penny to the top and bottom. This is no where close to the correct size and I even tried stretching the rubber and it was a no go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its doable!
customer_reviews.text: I like that my phone is visible to me when I work out. I need it to track my break time. But it doesn't turn at 360 degree which would help when using head phones to prevent being in the way when lifting weights. I wish it could go higher up on the arm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I do not have the money to purchase a fit bit or a product like it. Takes a little while to get used to, but after you get used to it you will love it. I will never run without it anymore. This product is not for sprinters, you phone will wiggle around to much, but for jogging, it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercise
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Fits the iPhoneX with a case with no issues. We use it around the house, walking the dog and exercising (jogging). Phone has never moved or fallen or even gotten loose, and the wrist strap is very comfortable. The phone stays where you want it, doesn't spin in circles.
customer_reviews.author: Gildagor

customer_reviews.title: Great for hands free running/biking/etc
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't really like is the rubber bands cover the camera. IT says you can swivel it to take pictures but it makes it a little difficult when the camera is at least partially covered. Holder is very sturdy and works well for all activities though.
customer_reviews.author: Jen N

customer_reviews.title: ok but could be better
customer_reviews.text: the problem with this wristband is it is not big enough to allow people to wrap it around their upper arms. It should be a wrist and arm band.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a way to have my phone handy at events and while walking my dog. The description stated for an Iphone 8+ and thankfully this one actually fit.
customer_reviews.author: wordlover

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable, difficult to rotate
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable for frequent usage at the gym. Thin-like rubber bands holding onto my heavy, thick phone... afraid they will easily snap soon. Difficult to rotate and put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking!
customer_reviews.text: This case is ideal for exercise walking! It fits on the wrist & I no longer need to carry my phone in my hand while walking. The phone fits securely without worry of dropping it.
customer_reviews.author: John51

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this arm mount, and it's super convenient. My only issue is that when you receive a call you have to pull it out and then take it off to re-attach it afterwards. Would be better if there was an easier attach method like a magnetic plate or something. Still excellent product though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Todish

customer_reviews.title: I use it for Instacart.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to scan UPCs/Barcodes all day long. I can keep my work app near and my hands free for more efficient work flow. I love it for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: B-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. Doesn’t get in the way when I’m working out. I love that it swivels in 360 and the high quality rubber does an excellent job keeping my giant 6s pluss in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dailey

customer_reviews.title: A bit bulky but works very well
customer_reviews.text: A bit bulky but I haven't found another product that makes it so easy to control my phone while jogging...while also securing the phone and protecting it from drops, etc
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...for a month...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: 11/25/2018 Matone reached out to me today proactively to replace my unit. Extremely pleased with their customer service. I hope this replacement unit will last longer. Worked wonderfully for about a month but the rubber tore after that :( It was not as durable as I hope it’s would have been.
customer_reviews.author: Rollan Dizon

customer_reviews.title: It's a great Idea but not practical
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the gym/running. - When running it will flop all over and slip to the hand when worn on the forearm unless you wear it tight. - However, when worn tight, it will cut off your circulation (my hand started to fall asleep after a few minutes). - If worn just for the gym and NOT running it's ok if you find a sweet spot on the band tightness.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wood

customer_reviews.title: The best for taking pictures outside
customer_reviews.text: Phone stays put. Wear it by the wrist/forearm. Works great if you don’t have too big arms
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for (I have an iPhone 6s). The brace can rub your wrist but it hasn’t caused significant discomfort and can be adjusted on the fly due to the elasticity of the band, yet it doesn’t slip when running. It will even stay comfortable and affixed when adjusted to fit on the side of my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: John Mc

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I first purchased because of convenience, but after awhile it began to literally cut my wrist due to wear and tear, and mind you I don't use it religiously, daily, etc. I can only wear it now with a sweater on covering my wrist so I don't have micro paper cut-like marks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fit my Samsung Galaxy S9 with Otterbox case, a must
customer_reviews.text: Worked out good for my work. Feels durable and it fit perfectly. Just so you know the fastening strap is good size for woman's size/small man's forarm/wrist only. But for me it is perfect. I used it yesterday and many people asked me where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Good while at lasted!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me almost 2 years! Used with Samsung Galaxy 7+ and Note 9+. One bottom band right side broke and still was still able to use to date. Left side bottom band is about to break. Top bands block top screen tool bar like turning on GPS and cell is not held firmly in place and bounces but I got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Medina

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a Vault-Tech Pip Boy from Fallout
customer_reviews.text: I felt like I had a modern Pip Boy from the Fallout series on my wrist. I have a large iPhone 8 Plus and when paired with this strap it makes it feel like true wearable technology. I use it at home when I want free hands to clean or work. I don’t use it often in public, only when at the gym or running at the park. It’s big and it’ll attract attention.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device. Very handy and fits both my iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device. Very handy and fits both my iPhone 7 plus and my wife's regular iPhone 7. Great to use. Does not move to much during running and allows you to still use it properly.
customer_reviews.author: JB 007

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Walking!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool design. I walk a lot, and used to get tired getting my phone out of my pocket each time I got a text, phone call, or an alert. Now with this device, I just look at my wrist. I actually wear it with my phone on the bottom side of my wrist, and not the top. It just seems easier to look at your phone this way.
customer_reviews.author: Reemis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great holder!
customer_reviews.text: Great holder! Did a few 10K runs and went on several cycling rides and it held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for running
customer_reviews.text: They do the job but can be a bit tight on the wrists
customer_reviews.author: Nads

customer_reviews.title: I love my wristband
customer_reviews.text: I love my wristband. This is exactly what I invisioned when I began searching out a solution to carry my phone while working out. This totally beats wearing it on my upper arm or putting it in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed broker

customer_reviews.title: Annoying and does not fit on arm
customer_reviews.text: Does not rotate 360 degrees. Annoying and wobbly when running. Could not stand the sounds and feeling while on firearm after 5 minutes. DOES NOT FIT ON ARM!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Nice works good
customer_reviews.text: I like it.it says iphone and when you get it its super small looking.but it can really stretch!it fits my stylo 4 with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Koty williams

customer_reviews.title: Easyily access all phone features
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several types of holders for my Galaxy Note 8 to wear when speed walking, this is the best of the lot. I can access all phone features easily plus GPS screen is easier to read when checking route distance, etc.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I could not swipe up from the bottom of the iPhone since the rubber straps are in the way. Also, the phone wobbles when jogging. Therefore, I returned it. <Edit> Happy to report, that I received my refund very promptly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sacks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this when walking my dogs and live the hands free
customer_reviews.author: david Krause

customer_reviews.title: Man thang
customer_reviews.text: I happen to have manly arms so it’s tight fitting but perfect
customer_reviews.author: Anuyu fitness  trainer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use especially when combined with wireless earbuds. Leaves hands free for running. The rotation feature makes it easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: momof2boys

customer_reviews.title: I like to walk around using my pedometer on my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and it fits my galaxy 7 edge. I like to walk around using my pedometer on my phone and this is a lot easier than having something hanging around my neck
customer_reviews.author: vallen

customer_reviews.title: Band is small
customer_reviews.text: I'm a runner and a massage therapist so while I don't have huge wrists they aren't tiny either. I could not imagine using thr band on a run longer than a few miles or if I was someone with muscular arms. The band us small. Other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: feel like the Predator when my iphone 6splus is one here. lol
customer_reviews.author: angelo r azana

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort and how well it fits the size of the phone no matter how big it is.
customer_reviews.author: Twitch.tv-dachaosbringer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, practical, has lasted well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a friend. Have been using mine daily for 1.5 years
customer_reviews.author: SSM

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted. Works perfect to read in bed. I start feeling like sleep and my phone dropping wakes me up again.
customer_reviews.author: MWilkins

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I needed for when I am ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for when I am working in the yard. My phone is accessible yet safe from being dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Grand Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I can no longer hold my iPhone. So this alternative had been a lifesaver. Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.author: James R. Nuttall

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife to hold her i-phone while she jogs. She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Serafino

customer_reviews.title: The design is genius!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product while working out and I workout early morning, afternoon, and evening. It doesn’t stretch out of place and is great for all temperatures during my workout. It’s also MORE convenient than looking at your arm-band, you can literally just lift your wrist and it’s easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Oliver

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR RETAIL MERCHANDISING
customer_reviews.text: Very useful tool for viewing store schematics while simultaneously setting product without having to set down your company device! Great hit among my team members.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Fits as described and thanks for those ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits as described and thanks for those that answered questions I had before purchasing...they were all accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Toma Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This would be excellent if there were a place for your house key somewhere. Otherwise, it is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanJan

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I had some doubts but i said to myself that im gonna try this. It's exactly what I needed. Exactly what it says in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its the best if you looking for something for sport
customer_reviews.author: Odai alsaeed

customer_reviews.title: It was everything I expected it to be. It ...
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I expected it to be. It did not mess with the phone screen so it was fully functional. I could use my camera and multiple other screens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if this was going to help me at the gym.......but it worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for Xbox "just dance" game, and it works very well. I probably paid for something more than I need, but bottom line is job getting done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shake test
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but gave it the vigorous shake test and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Tone

customer_reviews.title: Time to GO!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! Feels sturdy and comfortable. I don't feel like my phone is unsecure at all. Can make the band prettying tight or loose depending on your preference. Good quality Velcro too. Would definitely recommend to anyone who goes on walks with their smart phone. I use it to play Pokemon GO on my Google Pixel XL and it does it's job
customer_reviews.author: Sam Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very unique. Instead of putting my phone in a sleeve that will eventually get wet from sweat and condensation. It is also easier to change the song I am listening to and lets me maneuver the apps on my phone while running!
customer_reviews.author: Lovellsims

customer_reviews.title: Only for very small people.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 200 lb male and the strap doesn't even wrap around mu wrist. If I attempt to clasp it I would cut off my circulation. So if you are very tiny this may work for you. If you are average build FORGET ABOUT IT...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best one
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. Fits just right on my arms and very usable
customer_reviews.author: Shule

customer_reviews.title: Great product at low price!
customer_reviews.text: Unexpectedly great product for low price. Fits my iPhone 8 Plus with mophie charging case in it. No need to hold my phone while jogging!
customer_reviews.author: Semi-Pleased

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use it for an IPhone 6s. The strap and Velcro are durable and stay in place. The rotation is a fantastic feature and I am pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: i love this i use to play pogo and its great for driving walking biking just anything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very useful for running!
customer_reviews.text: leaves prints on your arm bc you have to pull it tight. might jiggle a little but it hasn't broken yet!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Really Like This One!
customer_reviews.text: Tried so many accessories for running and this is by far my favorite. I can easily look at my monitor while running and track how I am doing without having to take it off. It is also lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Hrh

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. It would not accommodate my iPhone 6s with Moto battery case.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA STAR

customer_reviews.title: Great and cool
customer_reviews.text: The product is exsctly what you need to avoid dropping your phone or leave it at home when working out.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Rincon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it as much as I thought I would, but I do enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Wildwill2

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I run trails and like to adjust my Spotify running tempo on the run and this device works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use iPhone w/this wristband
customer_reviews.text: band could be a little bigger b/c I wear my Fitbit on the same wrist . . . but it works and is great!
customer_reviews.author: Janet D.

customer_reviews.title: It cinches down tight and as long as the rubber doesn't tear it'll be a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. There's a little floppiness if you move your arms actively while running. It cinches down tight and as long as the rubber doesn't tear it'll be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but home button somewhat blocked.
customer_reviews.text: This works great except for the rubber part that holds it in often blocks my home button.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Wood

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Have used it regularly for about a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Have used it regularly for about a month now. So easy to quickly check where I am on the map. So much better than the high arm bands.
customer_reviews.author: kst

customer_reviews.title: It worked great. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my Iphone 5s while running the GAIA GPS app while we were hiking. It worked great. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!  Secure, comfortable, keeps phone dry of sweat and all of phone fully accessible.
customer_reviews.text: I had an armband type () where the phone goes into like a pouch. This made the buttons inaccessible and the plastic made the apps difficult to interact with and the armband cuts off circulation of the arm when your arm flexes. This Matone product, however, is fantastic!! Full access to everything on the phone and the swivel feature is nice. The rubber webbing that holds the phone seems very secure. Its much easier to access on the wrist than the upper arm and it doesn't cut off circulation. The phone is also kept away from the skin so it stays dry. Although if your goal is to keep the phone dry in the rain, this won't help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Mobydick86

customer_reviews.title: Love my wristband!
customer_reviews.text: Love my wristband! It gets a little itchy when it gets sweaty. It performs as expectedwith Nexus 6p.
customer_reviews.author: JZ3

customer_reviews.title: it is amazing 😆 I really love it
customer_reviews.text: Wow... it is amazing 😆 I really love it.. for gym time.. 😎
customer_reviews.author: Stefanny Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for running!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have an iPhone 7 with an otter box commuter case and it fits snuggly. Very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my daily walks. It is a little hard to put phone in and feels little heavy on wrist, but getting used to it. It is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jane O Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds phone great. Wish the wrist band was a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Bond

customer_reviews.title: Such a great workout performance band
customer_reviews.text: Such a great workout performance band. I did not want a arm band because they are uncomfortable and slip. Decided to go with this and I have not been disappointed. My phone doesn't move and it sits off the band making it lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This wristband makes working out so much easier and I can still have full function of my phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product. I was skeptical at first when I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I was skeptical at first when I started running. I thought it would fly off the holder. But it stayed put. I like to be able to view my stats easier than with it on my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Fraze

product_meta.title: Matone Wristband for iPhone X/8/8 Plus/7/7 Plus/6/6S Plus, 180° Rotatable Phone Holder Forearm Armband Ideal for Jogging Running Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S8/S7 & 4.0"-6.5" Smartphone (Black)
feature_bullets: 【Full Access & Hands Free】Open-face delivers complete access to all buttons and inputs of the smartphones, easy to function your phone without taking it out from the case. You can check messages, take photos and watch videos on your phone conveniently during exercise.

【Wide Compatibility】Superior elastic silicone material and tensile length up 5 inch to 9.5 inch, which enable it perfectly fits for iPhone 11, 11 Pro Max, 11 Pro, X, XS, XS Max, XR, 8, 8 Plus, 7, 7 Plus, 6, 6s, 6 Plus/6S Plus, Samsung Galaxy Note 10 Plus, Note 10, S20 Ultra, S20 Plus, S10, S10 Plus, S10e, S9, S9 Plus, S8, S7, S7 Edge, Google Pixel 3, Huawei P9/P8, Nexus, LG, Sony, MOTO and more with up to 5.5 inches screen.

【180° Rotating Forearm Band】Innovative and humanized design with 180°rotation makes it stand out from those similar products in market. Now You can freely adjust the angle and find suitable position for you. Don’t need to operate your phone upside down like before anymore!

【Comfortable Fit】Made of premium material, it is lightweight, breathable and comfortable to wear. High quality soft stretchy and reliable strap secures the phone to your wrist and allows you to workout and move in comfort, never worry about dropping your phone.

【Perfect for All Activities】Whether you love staying indoors, or prefer to be outdoors, you can use the armband for walking, jogging, cycling, hiking, climbing, fishing and doing household chores like cooking, mowing or cleaning.
